languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад фон Валанциус взирает на вас с нескрываемым изумлением — и трепетом.{/n} "{name}... не подводят ли меня мои глаза? Готов поклясться, что я только что видел, как ты {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}прош{mf|ел|ла} сквозь столб пламени{/d}, ведя за собой остальных..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад фон Валанциус взирает на вас с нескрываемым изумлением — и трепетом.{/n} "{name}... не подводят ли меня мои глаза? Готов поклясться, что я только что видел, как ты прош{mf|ел|ла} сквозь столб пламени, ведя за собой остальных..."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад фон Валанциус взирает на вас с нескрываемым изумлением — и трепетом.{/n} "{name}... не подводят ли меня мои глаза? Готов поклясться, что я только что видел, как ты {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}прош{mf|ел|ла} сквозь столб пламени{/d}, ведя за собой остальных..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his awe.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you step out of a deadly fire with the rest following in your wake..."

{n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you step out of a pillar of fire with the rest following in your wake..."

{n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."

languages.text: {n}エデルスラド・フォン・ヴァランシウスは驚きと不安を隠そうともせずにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「{name}…目の錯覚か？お前が{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}火柱から歩み出て{/d}、仲間がそれに続くのを確かに見た…」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラド・フォン・ヴァランシウスは驚きと…不安を隠そうともせずにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「{name}…目の錯覚か？お前が火柱から歩み出て、仲間がそれに続くのを確かに見た…」
{n}エデルスラド・フォン・ヴァランシウスは驚きと不安を隠そうともせずにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「{name}…目の錯覚か？お前が{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}火柱から歩み出て{/d}、仲間がそれに続くのを確かに見た…」

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德·冯·瓦兰修斯紧盯着你，毫不掩饰目光中的惊讶……以及恐惧。{/n}“{name}……是我看错了吗？我发誓，我刚看到你{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}从火海中走了出来{/d}，身后还跟着其他人……”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德·冯·瓦兰修斯紧盯着你，毫不掩饰目光中的惊讶……以及恐惧。{/n}“{name}……是我看错了吗？我发誓，我刚看到你从火海中走了出来，身后还跟着其他人……”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius vous dévisage sans chercher à dissimuler sa stupéfaction... et son appréhension.{/n} « {name}... Dites-moi que je rêve ! Je pourrais jurer que je viens de vous voir {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}sortir d'une colonne de feu{/d} avec tous les autres derrière vous... »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius vous dévisage sans chercher à dissimuler sa stupéfaction... et son appréhension.{/n} « {name}... Dites-moi que je rêve ! Je pourrais jurer que je viens de vous voir sortir d'une colonne de feu avec tous les autres derrière vous... »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius starrt dich mit unverhohlenem Erstaunen an ... und mit großer Angst.{/n} "{name} ... Trügen meine Augen mich? Ich hätte schwören können, dass ich euch eben {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}aus einer Feuersäule habe treten sehen{/d}, gefolgt von den anderen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius starrt dich mit unverhohlenem Erstaunen an ... und mit großer Angst.{/n} "{name} ... Trügen meine Augen mich? Ich hätte schwören können, dass ich euch eben aus einer Feuersäule habe treten sehen, gefolgt von den anderen ..."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius se te queda mirando sin tratar de ocultar su asombro... y su inquietud.{/n} «{name}... ¿Me engañan mis ojos? Juraría que acabo de ver cómo {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}salía usted de una columna de fuego{/d} y los demás {mf|le|la} acompañaban».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius se te queda mirando sin tratar de ocultar su asombro... y su inquietud.{/n} «{name}... ¿Me engañan mis ojos? Juraría que acabo de ver cómo salía usted de una columna de fuego y los demás {mf|le|la} acompañaban».

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius, gözlerindeki hayret ve kaygıyı saklamaya gerek duymaksızın sana bakıyor.{/n} "{name}? Gözlerim beni aldatıyor mu? Az önce ardında yoldaşlarınla {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}bir ateş sütunundan çıktığına{/d} şahitlik edebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "{name}... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}step out of a pillar of fire{/d} with the rest following in your wake..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius, gözlerindeki hayret ve kaygıyı saklamaya gerek duymaksızın sana bakıyor.{/n} "{name}? Gözlerim beni aldatıyor mu? Az önce ardında yoldaşlarınla bir ateş sütunundan çıktığına şahitlik edebilirim."

languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad von Valancius stares at you without trying to hide his astonishment — and trepidation.{/n} "... Do my eyes deceive me? I could swear that I just witnessed you step out of a pillar of fire with the rest following in your wake..."
